Date: Friday, 21 February 2025 at 2:30â€¯pm
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>, Tanagra Marketing Team <TanagraMarketingTeam@chalhoub.com>, Zainab AlHalwachi <Zainab.AlHalwachi@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Laura Casalino <Laura.Casalino@chalhoub.com>, Hasna Raissi <Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com>
Subject: insurance for Marketing stock ( damage stock)

Dear @Zainab AlHalwachi <mailto:Zainab.AlHalwachi@chalhoub.com> ,

Happy Friday!

Please note  that I had a meeting with @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  regarding insurance for marketing items (damaged stock). He confirmed that once the damaged stock is converted to marketing material, we can no longer claim further damages.

Additionally, starting from the beginning of 2015, there is no need for a declaration before sending normal stock to events, as we have automatic coverage for all stock.

 

Thank you @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  for sharing this great news.

Thanks & regards,

 

 

 

 

SAMIRA BATISSEâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹

MANAGER â€‘ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

â€‘

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
